availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of George Monohon and Katherine Monohon. Married to Nancy Jane Monohon in Mason County in October 1845. Father of James W. Monohon, Sarah F. Monohon, Annie Monohon, Catherine Monohon, John O. Monohon, and Mary E. Monohon. Farmer in Mason County in 1850. Farmer in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 152A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 3, p. 258.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Mason County Marriages, Film #000281842.
Find A Grave, "William Monohon (Unknown -1884)," Memorial #67162267, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67162267 (accessed February 20, 2019).
